name: Malwarebytes
description: Advanced anti-malware software to detect and remove threats.

name: WinDirStat
description: Disk usage statistics viewer and cleanup tool.

name: Everything Search
description: Fast file and folder search utility for Windows.

name: CrystalDiskInfo
description: Monitors hard drive health and S.M.A.R.T. status.

name: Sysinternals Suite
description: Collection of advanced system utilities for Windows troubleshooting.

name: ESET Online Scanner
description: Lightweight online malware scanner for on-demand scanning.

name: CCleaner
description: Cleans temporary files, caches, and registry issues to free up space.

name: Autoruns
description: Displays auto-start programs, allowing control of startup entries.
